item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 15:08:37 UTC – Details)

From the brand

UNIQUEBELLA Thermal Underwear

About UNIQUEBELLA

UNIQUEBELLA is a brand dedicated to the comfort of outdoor enthusiasts, specializing in winter thermal underwear, rainwear and sportswear for men, women and children. Over 200,000 sports fans in Europe, the USA and Japan highly appreciate the comfort of UNIQUEBELLA functional clothing.

Thermal Underwear Set

Ski Thermal Underwear

Professional Ski Wear

Thermal Underwear

If functional underwear, then UNIQUEBELLA

UNIQUEBELLA ski underwear is the ONLY professional ski underwear made of 3D SPHERICAL FUNCTIONAL PANEL SYSTEM EQUIPPED with thermal siphon technology and innovative ultra-high resolution retina technology, which is warm, breathable, quick-drying, compression, and skin-friendly.

Our goal

That every UNIQUEBELLA customer can enjoy comfort in every season! We are committed to developing professional sportswear and understanding your sports needs, creating great-looking designs and sports experiences.

Naturally fashionable

Our rain jackets and our functional clothing come from conscientious production. We attach great importance to high quality and careful processing.

Thanks to the perfect blend of different fibers, the added bamboo carbon fiber ensures fast sweat absorption and excellent durability.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.66 x 10.75 x 2.56 inches; 12.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ P004171
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 16, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ UNIQUEBELLA
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07XY3W6NF

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
HEAT PRESERVATION & SUPER WARM – Designed with high quality fleece lining, the thermal underwear mens is windproof, it can keep you warm while running, cycling, hiking, jogging or walk the dog in the winter morning
BREATHABILITY & QUICK DRY – Breathable and moisture wicking fabric is perfect to keep sweat away and dry fast, the mens thermal underwear perfectly repels odors and unpleasant smells left behind from sweat and dirt; With this thermal underwear men, you can happily enjoy outdoor tactical training or sports
STRETCHABLE & ABRASION RESISTANT – Made of 92% polyester and 8% spandex, this army thermal underwear offers maximum freedom and support of your body, protecting your muscle trauma during training and keeping you stay comfortable. Flatlock stitching creates a flat seam to the garment to ensure maximum comfort and prevents chafing

UNIQUEBELLA Thermal Underwear Set, Winter Hunting Gear Sport Long Johns Base Layer Bottom Top Winter Gear Compression Suits for Skiing Running

Sport Long Johns Base Layer for Male

Super Skin Touch

  • Midweight but not bulky
  • This men long johns set is made of a polyester and spandex fabric that is soft against the skin while fitting snug like a second skin.

High Stretchable & Flexibility

  • Suitable for many occasions - Feel Free to Wear Outside or Base layer
  • Perfect for indoor/outdoor activities, such as hiking, cycling, running, snowboarding, riding, climbing, skiing, camping, military& tactical games, hunting and fishing.

Breathablity & Quick Dry

  • Fabric is wicking moisture and drying much faster than any other material.
  • Breathable will not make repels odors and unpleasant smells left behind from sweat and dirt.

UNIQUEBELLA Thermal Underwear

  • Our men's base layer top and bottom are set with no labels
  • You can slip them on and off easily and can be worn under your clothes for added insulation and at the gym for added support and movement.
